Chapter 1

Listen to the story, repeat first each word and then the whole sentence after the native speaker, while following the literal word-for-word translation, and the proper translation.

Back to 5 steps

the

Johnsons'

Johnsons'

Droom

dream

Vakantie

holiday

The Johnsons' Dream Holiday
1-example 1
 

De

the

familie

family

Johnson

Johnson

woont

lives

in

in

Londen,

London

Engeland.

England

The Johnson family lives in London, England.
2

Peter

Johnson

Johnson

en

and

zijn

his

vrouw

wife

Helen

Helen

hebben

have

drie

three

kinderen.

children

Peter Johnson and his wife, Helen, have three children.
3

dochter

daughter

Mary

Mary

is

is

sixteen

jaar

Their daughter, Mary, is sixteen years old.
4

5

wil

voor

for

13
 

naar

weet

nog

he
